head.title: Saxonica: XSLT and XQuery Processing: Using XSLT 2.0 Stylesheets

meta.name: title
meta.content: Saxonica: XSLT and XQuery Processing: Using XSLT 2.0 Stylesheets

body.p: This section describes how to use Saxon XSLT 2.0 stylesheets, either from the command line, or from the Java API, or from Ant.
It also describes the subset of XSLT 3.0 (previously known as XSLT 2.1) that Saxon currently implements.
